nodes.text: The Aquaculture Facility was an Imperial research facility located on the moon Uridia. It was established as part of the Ando Project, and processed Uridium by submerging it in water inhabited by Andoan mineral-fish. The creatures fed off the raw rock, and the Uridium was then concentrated in the fish's tissue and was then extracted. A Rebel Alliance team discovered the base during the Galactic Civil War.
